page.title: 15The School Fete, Hilmarton.
page.content: Our school fete was held on our school field on June 15th. The event was called a Superteams Fete. There were many different stalls. There was a white elephant stall, a produce stall, a bottle stall and an ice-cream stall. There was an area where games took place and there was a raft that was turned upside down for bouncing on. There was also a skittle alley and a refreshment tent.There where pony rides in the other field all after noon. The Superteam event was between the schools from Cherhill, Heddington and Hilmarton (two teams). There were six events and Hilmarton A team won the competition. In the middle of the Superteam competition there was a country dance display by the children in Class II. The fete was organised by the Hilmarton School Association and raised Â£325.
